# excludingAll

**Type Property**

A filter that excludes all point of interest categories.

## Declaration

```swift
class var excludingAll: MKPointOfInterestFilter { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKPointOfInterestFilter/excludingAll]  to remove all points of interest from your map view without listing all the categories individually.

## Creating filters

- **includingAll**: A filter that includes all point of interest categories.
- **init(excluding:)**: Initialize the point of interest filter with a list of categories to exclude.
- **init(including:)**: Initialize the point of interest filter with a list of categories to include.
